languageKey.label: Enter the title of the category. You must enter a page title. The field is required.
Alias is a short unique string for identifying a category. Frontend applications may use this field to query a category by alias of the category instead of the id.
Select parent categories. A category may have more than one parent.
Enter a short description for the category.
Attach media files to the category.
The use of the media in the frontend depends on the typoscript template.
Enter synonyms for this category. This may be used in the frontend.
Select related categories. Use this to create non-hierarchial references to other categories
Stops backend rendering of the category tree in navigation and lists.
If set, non-Admin users cannot edit the category
